step_data.thought:
I see that I've already clicked on the 'STORES' link (ID 460) and now the Stores dropdown menu is visible. Looking at the accessibility tree, I can see that under the Stores menu there are several sections including 'Settings', 'Inventory', 'Taxes', 'Currency', and 'Attributes'. 

Since my goal is to manage store configuration and settings, I should look for options related to configuration. Under the 'Settings' section, I can see a link for 'Configuration' with ID 477. This is exactly what I need to click to access the store configuration settings.

I'll click on the 'Configuration' link to navigate to the store configuration page.
